    • Method Detail

      • createRole

        @PostMapping("/roles")
@Timed
@Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> createRole​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                   @Valid RoleDTO roleDto)
                                                            throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                   org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        POST /Roles : Create a new role.
        Parameters:
        roleDto - the roleDto to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new RoleDTO, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the Role has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • updateRole

        @PutMapping("/roles")
@Timed
@Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> updateRole​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                   @Valid RoleDTO roleDto)
                                                            throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                   org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        PUT /roles : Updates an existing role.
        Parameters:
        roleDto - the roleDto to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated roleDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the roleDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the roleDto couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • getAllRoles

        @GetMapping("/roles")
@Timed
@Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN")
public java.util.List<RoleDTO> getAllRoles()
        GET /roles : get all the roles.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of roles in body

      • getRole

        @GetMapping("/roles/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{authorityName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
@Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> getRole​(@PathVariable
                                                                java.lang.String projectName,
                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                java.lang.String authorityName)
                                                         throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /roles/:projectName/:authorityName : get the role of the specified project and authority.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The project name
        authorityName - The authority name
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the roleDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)
        Throws:
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
